content.question: The pattern in the numbers of nuclear weapons shown in the table after 1985 is best explained by which of the following?

choices.label: The spread of communism in Eastern Europe
Proxy wars in Asia and Africa
Globalization and the development of international economic unions
The collapse of the Soviet Union and the end of the Cold War

content.answer: The collapse of the Soviet Union and the end of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
